data.lyric:
[ti:Better]
[ar:ZAYN]
[al:Better]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Better - ZAYN (泽恩)
[00:03.85]Lyrics by：Zayn Malik/Philip Von Boch Scully/Cole Citrenbaum/David "Lucky Daye" Brown/Dustin "Dab" Bowie/Mike "Hunnid" McGregor
[00:07.70]Composed by：Zayn Malik/Philip Von Boch Scully/Cole Citrenbaum/David "Lucky Daye" Brown/Dustin "Dab" Bowie/Mike "Hunnid" McGregor
[00:11.56]Hope I only leave good vibes on your living room floor
[00:17.01]It hurts so bad that I didn't when you asked for more
[00:22.71]Your dad probably loves me more than he ever did now
[00:27.45]'Cause I finally got up
[00:30.49]Yeah we're finally knocked down
[00:34.19]Yeah sometimes it's better that way
[00:36.81]Gotta let it go so your heart don't break
[00:39.29]'Cause I love you
[00:41.88]Yeah baby I love you
[00:45.18]Just this one time hear what I'm tryna say
[00:48.06]Know you might not feel quite the same way
[00:50.77]But I love you
[00:53.32]I tell you I love you
[00:57.00]Why why wait to fight
[01:00.97]Give it a try
[01:03.23]Or I'll say goodbye while it's right
[01:07.60]Can we save tears in your eyes
[01:12.09]I'm making you cry
[01:14.80]Why wait to hate can we save love
[01:18.70]I fell in I'm falling I'm for you
[01:21.54]I can't let you fall through the floor too
[01:24.08]It's a gamble to take any more of you
[01:26.80]It's a gamble to take-take more you
[01:29.90]Still in my mind sometimes I must admit it
[01:32.76]Like it's a crime on trial I got acquitted
[01:35.62]Me and you wasn't meant we wasn't fitted
[01:38.40]Like it's a glove I hated to admit it
[01:41.88]'Cause obviously we go back
[01:44.78]So why would we ruin that
[01:47.72]In too deep we're rearranged
[01:50.45]Now you wanna ask for names
[01:53.34]We can't let this fruit go bad
[01:56.08]Sayin' things we can't take back
[01:58.91]In too deep we're rearranged
[02:01.78]Say you feel the same
[02:04.59]Why why wait to fight
[02:08.72]Give it a try
[02:10.90]Or I'll say goodbye while it's right
[02:15.08]Can we save tears in your eyes
[02:19.89]I'm watching you cry
[02:22.52]Why wait to hate can we save love
data.trans:
[ti:Better]
[ar:ZAYN]
[al:Better]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.85]//
[00:07.70]//
[00:11.56]希望我给你留下的只有美好回忆
[00:17.01]一想到当时你那么渴望 我却没有兴致 我就觉得很难受
[00:22.71]现在你爸爸或许比以前更喜欢我了
[00:27.45]因为我终于有出息了
[00:30.49]我们也终于被击垮了
[00:34.19]有时候 那样会更好
[00:36.81]必须学会放手 才能免于心碎
[00:39.29]因为我爱你
[00:41.88]宝贝 我爱你
[00:45.18]就这一次 听我说
[00:48.06]我知道你可能和我感觉不同
[00:50.77]但我爱你
[00:53.32]我告诉你 我爱你
[00:57.00]为什么要抵抗
[01:00.97]试一试吧
[01:03.23]不然我就会在适当的时候说再见
[01:07.60]你能不能不要流眼泪
[01:12.09]我让你忍不住哭泣
[01:14.80]为什么要心怀怨恨 我们能否多点爱
[01:18.70]我陷落了 我沦陷了 我为你倾倒
[01:21.54]我不能让你也经受折磨
[01:24.08]再这样为你沉沦 后果难以预料
[01:26.80]再痴迷于你 后果难以预料
[01:29.90]有时候我依然会想起 我必须承认
[01:32.76]就像审判一样 我被无罪释放了
[01:35.62]我和你不是命中注定 我们不合适
[01:38.40]就像不合适的手套 我不愿承认
[01:41.88]因为 显而易见 我们总会回到彼此身边
[01:44.78]那我们为何要毁掉那份感情
[01:47.72]陷得太深 我们从头再来
[01:50.45]现在你想知道他们的名字
[01:53.34]我们不能让美好时刻变成折磨
[01:56.08]说一些我们无法收回的话
[01:58.91]陷得太深 我们从头再来
[02:01.78]告诉我 你也是一样的感觉
[02:04.59]为什么要抵抗
[02:08.72]试一试吧
[02:10.90]不然我就会在适当的时候说再见
[02:15.08]你能不能不要流眼泪
[02:19.89]我看着你哭泣
[02:22.52]为什么要心怀怨恨 我们能否多点爱
